definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts
to cut the ribbon (at a launching or opening ceremony)
prices scissor (caught between low income and high prices)

sentences.english: I lifted my right hand and made scissoring movements with my first two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我抬起右手，用食指和中指做了几个剪东西的动作。

sentences.english: However, their cutters can be twice as expensive as the Easy Cutter.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它们的切割器的价格是“易剪”的两倍。

sentences.english: She was also cut out in paper, but she had a dress of the clearest gauze.
sentences.chinese: 女郎也是用卡纸剪的，但是她却穿着透明的纱裙。

sentences.english: I'd like to shorten my bangs down to touch my eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 我想把刘海剪到眉毛的位置。

sentences.english: You don't want a crewcut, do you?
Everytime you cut your hair, he is certainly to be the first person to find that.
sentences.chinese: 你每次剪了头发，他都会立即发觉。

sentences.english: You are to give them the firstfruits of your grain, new wine and oil, and the first wool from the shearing of your sheep
sentences.chinese: 初收的五谷，新酒和油，并初剪的羊毛，也要给他。

sentences.english: Use slice cutting on the side section by the angle of the section.
sentences.chinese: 发片与分区角度拉出以滑剪手法处理。

sentences.english: Next, cut from the outside edge of the circle to the inner circle, as shown.
sentences.chinese: 然后，从圆的外边缘到内孔剪一个口，如图所示。

sentences.english: I take the train to go to work this morning and the conductor did not want to take my train ticket.
sentences.chinese: 今晨我程火车上班，车掌先生不要剪我的车票。

sentences.english: Out of the shower now, I finish the last of the beer while trimming my toenails.
sentences.chinese: 洗完澡，我剪着趾甲喝完最后一口啤酒。

sentences.english: Its wick trimmers and trays are to be of pure gold.
sentences.chinese: 灯台的蜡剪和蜡花盘也是要精金的。

sentences.english: The series of works starts serial inspiration design from the muse: paper-cutting techniques.
sentences.chinese: 作品利用剪纸的连续剪技法，展开系列性的设计发想。

sentences.english: My movies have never been frenetically cut, the way a lot of action is done today.
sentences.chinese: 我的电影从来不曾像今天很多动作片那样乱剪一通。

sentences.english: Yes, please. Just to the bottom of my ears.
sentences.chinese: 是的，两鬓剪到耳朵下面就行了。

sentences.english: Like cutting silk, this black skimmer looks for something for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 像剪丝绸一样，这只黑剪嘴鸥寻找午餐。

definition: to cut off/to cut away/to trim
to shave the whole head clean/crushing defeat
